channel.title: Help with bluecore source making a 1v1
channel.description:
im trying to use the bluecore source and trying to make a 1v1 pk zone in it can sum 1 plz help me cause i made a portal that teles u to edge but edge portal not working so i need help with
1. finding a place to put 1v1
2. getting the code to make it only 1v1 pking
plz i rlly need help

item.title: Help with bluecore source making a 1v1
item.dc:creator: @xx_pk3r_xx xx pk3r xx
item.description:
@xx_pk3r_xx wrote:

k ty ill try that rite now…

tried varrock and it didnt work so idk wat to do i need a place to put 1v1 pking and i need the tele coords to that location…

Read full topic

but try walking there if you can then idk

item.source: Help with bluecore source making a 1v1

item.title: Help with bluecore source making a 1v1
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

did you add a case with the portals object number like this:

case YOUR OBJECT ID HERE:
	if(teleblock == true) {

sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = WHERE YOU WANT TO GO (X AXIS);
teleportToY = WHERE YOU WANT TO GO (Y AXIS);
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“TEXT YOU SEE WHEN YOU TELEPORT!”);
}
break;

SO MY CUSTOM PORTAL IS LIKE THIS

case 9991:
	if(teleblock == true) {

sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Lumbridge!”);
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with bluecore source making a 1v1
item.dc:creator: @JKD JKD
item.description:
@JKD wrote:

Remember to add in autospawn.cfg, maybe even objects.cfg and have the correct makeGlobalObject and correct teleX teleY! And most importantly, compile!
